## Delay.seconds() method

Delay for an arbitrary amount of time.

**Signature:**

```typescript
seconds(value: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | How long to delay for, in seconds. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

A promise that fulfils after the given time.
